page_content: Discusses the legal foundations and calculations for agricultural lease rates in the Canton of Aargau.
Discusses improvements in the job market and mentions a software update for managing job seekers.
Provides information on data collection procedures for special schools, including a PDF guide for data entry.
Outlines the steps for recognized institutions in the Canton of Aargau to submit annual reports.
Discusses the current flood situation in the Canton of Aargau and the measures being taken.
